string-array.name: anzeigen_sortierung_werte
string-array.item: " WHERE wordart = 'NOT_SPECIFIED' ORDER BY wort1 COLLATE NOCASE ASC"
" WHERE wordart = 'IDIOM' ORDER BY wort1 COLLATE NOCASE ASC"
" WHERE wordart = 'NOUN' ORDER BY wort1 COLLATE NOCASE ASC"
" WHERE wordart = 'ADJECTIVE' ORDER BY wort1 COLLATE NOCASE ASC"
" WHERE wordart = 'VERB' ORDER BY wort1 COLLATE NOCASE ASC"
" WHERE wordart = 'ADVERB' ORDER BY wort1 COLLATE NOCASE ASC"
" WHERE wordart = 'SENTENCE' ORDER BY wort1 COLLATE NOCASE ASC"
" WHERE wort1 = '' ORDER BY id ASC"
